General.Name: Yapp Automotive Systems Co Ltd
General.Description: YAPP Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of automotive energy storage system products. The company operates in China, India, Russia, the Czech Republic, Germany, the United States, Mexico, Uzbekistan, Brazil, Japan, and France. YAPP Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Yangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 508, Yangzijiang South Road, Yangzhou, China, 225009
